name: Jedi Fallen Order VR
description:
Jedi: Fallen Order VR is an action-adventure game, developed on Jedi Fallen Order base:
You, a Jedi Padawan-turned-fugitive, must fight for your suvival as you explore the mysteries of a long-extinct civilization in hopes of rebuilding the Jedi Order. Order 66 Timeline. A jedi on the run. After narrowly escaping the Jedi purge, you’re on a quest to rebuild your fallen Order. Pick up the pieces of your shattered past and complete your Jedi training, all while staying one step ahead of the Empire and its deadly Inquisitors.
Features:
Jedi pull function.

CONTROLS:
VR:
Left Controller - Movement
Trigger - Interaction

Made by Void Update.
